name: Down the Memory Lane
description:
"Man. It feels so weird to be back. I haven't been here in years.

Not since...

Not since you died."

You are Jake. Years ago, you died, leaving your partner, Sylvia, behind. One day, you came back to life without memories of the life you used to lead.

Today, you and Sylvia visit your childhood home with hopes of the familiar scenery restoring at least some of your lost memories. Will you succeed or are your efforts doomed to fail?

Used assets
